title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How FanDuel's AI Chatbot Revolutionizes Sports Betting Experience (SPF203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - FanDuel的AI聊天机器人如何革新体育博彩体验 (SPF203)
abstract: Discover how FanDuel leveraged AWS AI services to build AceAI, a groundbreaking in-app chatbot that transforms the sports betting experience. Learn how this solution enables instant access to betting insights, streamlines bet construction, and enhances responsible gaming capabilities while driving customer engagement. We'll explore the architecture, implementation challenges, and measurable business outcomes of this innovative solution.
abstract_cn: 了解FanDuel如何利用AWS AI服务构建AceAI，这是一款突破性的应用内聊天机器人，彻底改变了体育博彩体验。了解该解决方案如何实现即时访问投注洞察、简化投注构建并增强负责任博彩能力，同时提升客户参与度。我们将探讨这一创新解决方案的架构、实施挑战以及可衡量的业务成果。
